programme.title: The Mallorca Files
programme.desc: When a groom-to-be is found dead in the swimming pool of a luxury villa, Miranda and Max believe it's the work of a prostitute who stuns her clients and then robs them.

programme.title: Unforgotten : le passé déterré
programme.desc: Under the glare of media spotlights, the team race to find the evidence to prove the identity of Hayley's killer.

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Thomas goes down memory lane with Alison, but the truth is muddied when the other ghosts tell their version of events. Mike struggles with his own memories of Alison's past.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House, New Home
programme.desc: George visits a 300-year-old house with too many loos. And in south London, a mini 1930s bungalow with a tiny lounge needs clever design solutions.
